wikipedia_page.main: Ranbir Singh Suri, Baron Suri (born 10 February 1935) is a Conservative life peer in the United Kingdom's House of Lords, nominated in 2014. He is a businessman and formerly the general secretary of the Board of British Sikhs. He was made a Life Peer by Queen Elizabeth II on 15 September 2014, as the Baron Suri, of Ealing in the London Borough of Ealing.

response: *Ranbir Singh Suri, Baron Suri – Member House of Lords
